data.title: Meet Our Team
data.meta_description: Meet our team of private markets experts, including our Executive Team, Senior Management and Board of Directors.
data.text:
Jonathan Abraham Managing Director Client Solutions Asia-Pacific Suhail Albaz Managing Director Client Solutions EMEA Dr. Adrian Andermatt Managing Director Compliance, Legal & Tax EMEA Dr. Dmitriy Antropov Managing Director Infrastructure EMEA Joanna Asfour Managing Director Client Solutions EMEA Robert-Jan Bakker Managing Director Client Solutions EMEA Nils Bartel Partner Investments EMEA Andreas Baumann Partner Private Equity EMEA Roy Baumann Managing Director Client Solutions EMEA Andrew Bellis Partner Private Credit Americas Bill Berry Partner Private Credit Americas Piotr Biezychudek Managing Director Private Equity Americas René Biner Partner Investment Office EMEA Patrik Bless Managing Director Technology EMEA Christopher Bone Partner Private Credit EMEA Benjamin A. Breier Partner Private Equity Americas

Benjamin A. Breier

Partner

Benjamin A. Breier is Head of US Private Equity Health and Life, based in Denver. He is also a member of the Private Equity Direct Co-Investments, extension secondaries and direct lead growth investments in Health and Life Investment Committee. He has 26 years of industry experience. Prior to joining Partners Group, he was Chief Executive Officer, President and Member of the Board of Directors of Kindred Healthcare, LLC, one of the largest providers of healthcare services in the United States. Prior to that, he served as Senior Vice President of Operations at Concentra and as the Chief Operating Officer and Chief Executive Officer of Premier Practice Management. Benjamin is a former member of the Business Roundtable (BRT) and the Wall Street Journal CEO Council and previously served on the Board of the Federation of American Hospitals and InnovaCare Health. He continues to serve on the Board of the University of Miami’s School of Business, the Board of Overseers at the University of Pennsylvania and the University of Louisville Health Board of Directors. He also formerly chaired the Louisville Healthcare CEO Council. He is the author of Intentional Disruption: Leadership Lessons in Healthcare, Business, and Beyond, published by Forbes in 2022. Benjamin holds a bachelor’s degree in Economics from the Wharton School of Business at the University of Pennsylvania, USA and an MBA and an MHA from the University of Miami, Florida, USA.

Stefanie Breuer Managing Director Client Solutions EMEA Sarah Brewer Partner Client Solutions EMEA Todd Bright Partner Infrastructure Americas Mike Bryant Partner Real Estate EMEA Lukas Bucher Managing Director Private Equity EMEA Andre Burba Managing Director Infrastructure Americas Roberto Cagnati Partner Portfolio Solutions EMEA Vanessa Camilleri Managing Director Business Services EMEA Andrew Campbell Managing Director Compliance, Legal & Tax EMEA Emel Can Managing Director Board of Directors EMEA

Emel Can

Managing Director

Emel Can is the Global Head of the Group Internal Audit business unit, based in Zug. She has 25 years of experience in auditing. Prior to joining Partners Group, Emel was a Partner at Deloitte AG, where she led the Insurance Audit and Assurance practice, which she built and established in Switzerland. In a career that spans the globe, she has been responsible for the external audits of global financial services companies. She has also advised multi-national companies in the area of corporate governance, SOX implementations, IFRS, internal audit and regulatory matters. She is a certified FINMA lead auditor, Swiss and Turkish Certified Public Accountant and holds a bachelor's degree in economics from the University of Istanbul, Turkey.

Will Chen Managing Director Private Equity Americas

Will Chen

Managing Director

Will Chen is a Managing Director in the Private Equity Technology Industry Vertical, based in Denver. He is a member of the Private Equity Direct Co-investments, extension secondaries and Direct Lead growth investments in Technology. Will has over 21 years of industry experience. He has proven investment origination experience within the technology and software sectors and has led successful value creation programs at multiple portfolio companies. Prior to joining Partners Group, Will was a Managing Director in the Corporate Private Equity Group within Goldman Sachs Asset Management. While at Goldman Sachs, he served on the board of directors for software and tech-enabled services companies such as Sterling, Aptos, CommerceHub and Fortress Information Security. Previously, he held positions at Apax Partners and Bain & Company. He has an MBA from the Wharton School at the University of Pennsylvania, and a BS and MS from the School of Engineering at Stanford University.

Joseph Chien Managing Director Real Estate Asia-Pacific Alex Cho Managing Director Client Solutions Asia-Pacific Robert Collins Partner Client Solutions Americas Thomas Clark Managing Director Private Equity Americas Dr. David Daum Partner Infrastructure EMEA Abhishek Dhayal Managing Director Private Credit Americas Andrew Deakin Partner Private Equity EMEA Dr. Jürgen Diegruber Partner Private Partner Private Equity EMEA René Herren Managing Director Portfolio Solutions EMEA Christian Hertig Managing Director Private Equity EMEA Peter Holden Managing Director Real Estate EMEA Andreas Holzmüller Managing Director Private Equity EMEA Dr. Bernhard Hössli Managing Director Compliance, Legal & Tax EMEA Adam Howarth Partner Portfolio Solutions Americas Annie Hsieh Managing Director Client Solutions Americas Oscar Huggare Managing Director Client Solutions EMEA Max Ilmoni Managing Director Client Solutions EMEA Anne-Jan Jager Managing Director Real Estate EMEA Andreas Jauker Managing Director Compliance, Legal & Tax EMEA Israel Javier Managing Director Finance Asia-Pacific Juri Jenkner Partner Chief Executive Office EMEA Sujit John Managing Director Private Equity Americas Erik Kaas Partner Client Solutions EMEA Keeran Kang Managing Director Real Estate EMEA Andrew Kateiva Managing Director Client Solutions Asia-Pacific Walter Keller Seasoned Partner Private Equity EMEA Andreas Knecht Partner Operations EMEA Dr. Guido Koch Partner Client Solutions EMEA

Dr. Guido Koch

Partner

Dr. Guido Koch is Co-Head of the Client Solutions business department, based in Zug. He co-leads Partners Group’s Clients Pillar and a member of the Global Executive board. He has been with Partners Group since 2007 and has 20 years of industry experience. Prior to joining Partners Group, he worked as a management consultant at Droege & Comp in Asia and Europe, with a focus on the Asia operations of European headquartered firms. He holds a master's degree in business administration from the University of Hamburg, Germany and a PhD in international management from the University of St. Gallen (HSG), Switzerland. He is also a research fellow of the SMU/Wharton research center.

Carsten König Managing Director Infrastructure EMEA

Carsten König

Managing Director

Carsten König is part of the Infrastructure Asset Management team, based in Zug. He is a member of the Board of Directors of the firm's portfolio companies Greenlink and VSB Renewables. He has 28 years of industry experience, predominantly in the energy, automotive and engineered products sector. Prior to joining Partners Group, he worked at AlixPartners as a Managing Director, advising his clients on value creation programs and leading restructuring and turnaround projects including taking executive board positions such as CEO, COO or CRO during the transformation. Previously he worked for Roland Berger, FAG Kugelfischer and DEKRA AG. He holds a degree of Business Administration and Engineering (Dipl. Wirtsch.-Ing.) from Karlsruhe University / Karlsruhe Institute of Technology, Germany.

Nick Kuys Managing Director Infrastructure Asia-Pacific

Nick Kuys

Managing Director

Nick Kuys is part of the Infrastructure Asset Management team, based in Sydney. He is member of the Board of Directors of the firm's portfolio companies Evolution Rail (HCMT), Ararat Wind Farm and Unity Digital Infrastructure. He has 17 years of industry experience. Prior to joining Partners Group, he worked at Australian Industrial Energy, DUET Group, Macquarie Group, Westpac Banking Group and Deloitte and Touche. He holds a bachelor's degree in Commerce from the University of Cape Town, South Africa and a Masters of Business Administration from the Australian Graduate School of Management in Australia and was previously a Chartered Accountant.

Andrew Kwok Managing Director Infrastructure Asia-Pacific

Andrew Kwok

Managing Director

Andrew Kwok is the Co-Head of Infrastructure Asia business unit, based in Singapore, and sits on the Infrastructure Investment Committee and the Board of Directors of the firm's portfolio company Green Island Renewable Power and Unity Digital Infrastructure. He has 28 years of industry experience and, prior to joining Partners Group, worked as a Director in Challenger Limited's fund division, in Westpac Institutional Bank's infrastructure and PPP fund practice and at PricewaterhouseCoopers. Andrew holds a bachelor’s degree in economics from the University of Sydney, Australia and is a Chartered Accountant in Australia.

Ron Lamontagne Managing Director Real Estate Americas

Ron Lamontagne

Managing Director

Ron Lamontagne is Co-Head of Real Estate in the Americas, based in New York. He is a member of the Real Estate Direct Investment Committee and Global Investment Committee, with 36 years of industry experience. Prior to joining Partners Group, Ron was a Director at GE Capital Real Estate where he was responsible for equity investments in the US and Canada. Other previous roles at GE include debt originations, asset management, loan modifications, property dispositions and risk management. He holds an MBA in finance and marketing from the New York University Stern School of Business.

Patrick Langan Managing Director Infrastructure Americas

Patrick Langan

Managing Director

Patrick Langan is part of the Infrastructure Americas business unit, based in New York. He has been with Partners Group since 2014 and has 13 years of industry experience. Prior to joining Partners Group, he worked in private equity at Barclays and in investment banking at Goldman Sachs & Co. He holds a bachelor’s degree in finance and accounting from James Madison University, Virginia, USA.

Joel Larkins Managing Director Infrastructure Americas

Joel Larkins

Managing Director

Joel Larkins is part of the Infrastructure Asset Management team, based in Denver. He has 28 years of industry experience. Prior to joining Partners Group, he worked at Andeavor, AES, Reliant Energy, LyondellBasell, and ExxonMobil. He holds a bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering from the University of Washington, USA and an MBA from Stanford University, California, USA.

David Layton Chief Executive Officer Chief Executive Office Americas

David Layton

Chief Executive Officer

David Layton is the Chief Executive Officer of Partners Group. David leads Partners Group’s Executive Team, its Global Executive Board and he is a member of the firm’s Global Investment Committee. David principally divides his time between Partners Group's Americas headquarters in Colorado, US and Partners Group's global headquarters in Zug, Switzerland. He was previously the Head of Partners Group's Private Equity business department, and he has represented the firm on the Board of Directors of several of the firm's portfolio companies, including Universal Services of America, Nobel Learning Communities, MicroPoise Measurement Systems, Cabot Credit Management, Pacific Bells, and Strategic Partners. David holds a bachelor’s degree from Brigham Young University’s Marriott School of Management.

Stefan Lempen Managing Director Real Estate EMEA

Stefan Lempen

Managing Director

Stefan Lempen is Co-Head of the Real Estate Partnership Investments business unit, based in Zug, and a member of the Global Investment Committee and the Real Estate Partnership Investments Investment Committee. He also sits on the Board of Directors of Central European Industrial Fund, Investment Circle Germany-Spain S.A., Nordic Tower Properties AB, Skylab and Norwegian Lights AS. Stefan has been with Partners Group since 2002 and has 28 years of industry experience. Prior to joining Partners Group, he worked for Credit Suisse within their Swiss Corporates team, arranging financing solutions for international corporates headquartered in Switzerland. He holds a bachelor's degree in business administration from Bern University of Applied Sciences, Switzerland.

Anne Lester Member of the Board of Directors Board of Directors EMEA

Anne Lester

Member of the Board of Directors

Anne Lester is an independent member of the Board of Directors of Partners Group Holding AG. She is a member of the Client Oversight Committee, the Risk & Audit Committee and the Nomination & Compensation Committee. Her mandate is focused on driving forward Partners Group's bespoke private markets solutions for the Defined Contribution ("DC") pensions market. She has over 31 years of experience in senior leadership roles at JP Morgan Asset Management, most recently serving as Managing Director, Portfolio Manager and Head of Retirement Solutions in the Multi-Asset Solutions division where she launched JPMorgan's SmartRetirement Target Date franchise. She also founded the Aspen Leadership Forum on Retirement Savings in conjunction with AARP and holds three patents for the design of a dynamic withdrawal investment process and for the evaluation of target date funds. Anne holds an Bachelor's degree in Politics from Princeton University, New Jersey, USA and a Master's in International Relations from the Johns Hopkins University School of Advanced International Studies, Washington, DC, USA.

Martin Liew Managing Director Private Equity Asia-Pacific

Martin Liew

Managing Director

Martin Liew is Head of Private Equity Partnership Investments in Asia, based in Singapore. He is a member of the Private Equity Partnership Investments Committee and the Private Equity Direct Co-Investments and Direct Lead Growth Investments Investment Committees. He has been with Partners Group since 2011 and has 19 years of industry experience. Prior to joining Partners Group, he worked at CDC Group and Nomura. He holds a bachelor's degree in econometrics from Pantheon-Sorbonne University, France.

Derek Lim Managing Director Private Equity Americas

Derek Lim

Managing Director

Derek Lim is part of the Private Equity Goods and Products business unit based in Denver. He is a member of the Private Equity Direct Co-Investments, extension secondaries and direct lead growth investments in Goods and Products. He is also a member of the Board of Directors of the firm's portfolio company SureWerx. He joined Partners Group in 2022 and has 19 years of private equity experience. Prior to joining Partners Group, he was a Managing Director at Ardian and a founding member of the North American buyout fund, focused on industrial and industrial services investments. Previously, he worked at Apax Partners, Fenway Partners and Citigroup. He holds an MBA from The Wharton School at the University of Pennsylvania and a bachelor's degree in economics from Occidental College.

Sheng Liu Managing Director Private Equity Asia-Pacific

Sheng Liu

Managing Director

Sheng Liu is Head of Partners Group's Shanghai office and part of the Private Equity Health and Life business unit. He is a member of the Private Equity Direct Co-Investments, extension secondaries and direct lead growth investments in Health and Life Investment Committee as well as a member of the Board of Directors of the firm's portfolio companies Aiyingshi, Green Tea Restaurant, BCR Group and Apex Logistics. He has been with Partners Group since 2013 and has 19 years of industry experience. Prior to joining Partners Group, he worked at Cathay Capital Private Equity as Investment Director in charge of both investment and value creation, and before that at KPMG. He holds a bachelor’s degree in finance from the Shanghai University of Finance and Economics, China.

Dr. Kevin Lu Partner Client Solutions Asia-Pacific

Dr. Kevin Lu

Partner

Dr. Kevin Lu is Partners Group’s Chairman of Asia, a member of the Global Executive Board and Head of Partners Group’s Singapore office. Additionally, he chairs the International Advisory Council for PG LIFE, the firm's SDG-focused fund series, and leads the development of relationships with key strategic clients in Asia. Kevin has been with Partners Group since 2014. Prior to joining Partners Group, he served as Asia Regional Director and Chief Financial Officer at the World Bank Group's Multilateral Investment Guarantee Agency, overseeing its finance, investments, portfolio management and risk analytics functions. He serves on the Advisory Board of the World Bank's Global Infrastructure Facility, Monetary Authority of Singapore's Financial Centre Advisory Panel, the International Experts Advisory Committee of Insurance Asset Management Association of China, and the World Economic Forum's Global Future Council on Investing. Dr. Kevin Lu has furthermore published commentaries in the Wall Street Journal, Foreign Policy, Washington Post, Financial Times and the Straits Times. He is an Adjunct Professor at Yale-NUS, a Senior Fellow at Milken Institute and a Distinguished Fellow at INSEAD.

Benno Lüchinger Managing Director Private Equity EMEA

Benno Lüchinger

Managing Director

Benno Lüchinger is Co-Head of Private Equity Partnership Investments in Europe, based in London, also serving as a member of the Global Investment Committee, the Private Equity Partnership Investment Committee and the Private Equity Direct Co-Investments, extension secondaries and direct lead growth investments in Goods and Products Investment Committees. He has been with Partners Group since 2007 and has 16 years of industry experience, having joined Partners Group from Credit Suisse Private Banking, J.P. Morgan and Credit Suisse First Boston. He holds a master's degree in banking and finance from the University of St. Gallen (HSG), Switzerland.

Henri Lusa Managing Director Private Credit EMEA

Henri Lusa

Managing Director

Henri Lusa is part of the European Private Credit business unit, based in London. He is a member of the Direct Debt Europe Investment Committee and the Direct Debt Asia Investment Committee. He has been with Partners Group since 2011 and has 20 years of industry experience. Prior to joining Partners Group, he worked in Leveraged Financed at UniCredit in Munich, London and Milan. He started his career at PricewaterhouseCoopers and holds a master in Corporate Finance from the SDA Bocconi School of Management, Italy and a master’s degree in economics and business administration from HEC Lausanne, Switzerland. He is also a chartered alternative investment analyst.

Jose Mahomar Managing Director Client Solutions Americas

Jose Mahomar

Managing Director

Jose Mahomar is a Managing Director leading the US Consultant Relations business unit, based in New York. He has been with Partners Group since 2023 and has 20 years of industry experience. Before joining Partners Group, Jose spent eighteen years at Goldman Sachs Asset Management, most recently as a Managing Director within the Americas Client Business where he Co-led the Americas Consultant Relations team. In this role, Jose was responsible for developing and maintain strategic relationships with institutional consultants across North America. Jose earned a BBA in Finance from the Mays School of Business at Texas A&M University.

Toby Mannock Managing Director Private Equity Asia-Pacific

Toby Mannock

Managing Director

Toby Mannock is Head of the Private Equity Business Unit in Australia. Toby commenced with Partners Group in 2023 and has over 19 years of Industry Experience and 5 years Military Experience. Prior to joining Partners Group, Toby was Director, M&A / Head of Sector Team at ANZ Institutional Bank, Managing Director / Head of Division and Senior Advisor at Renaissance Capital, after commencing career with KPMG Corporate Finance. He holds Bachelor of Laws and Bachelor of Commerce degrees from Monash University and completed the Masterclass Program in Private Equity at LBS. Toby graduated from the Royal Military Academy Sandhurst and was formerly a Captain in the British Army, commissioning into The Parachute Regiment.

Michael Marquardt Partner Business Services Asia-Pacific

Michael Marquardt

Partner

Michael Marquardt is Head of the Business Services business unit, based in Singapore, and is a member of the Executive Team. He has 30 years of industry experience with large financial services companies including IQ-EQ, BlackRock and American Express. He has held roles such as Asia Regional CEO, Asia Pacific Chief Operating Officer, Japan Chief Operating Officer and Global Risk Manager. Prior to joining Partners Group, he was the Asia Regional CEO for IQ-EQ . He holds an MBA from Boston University, Massachusetts, USA, and a bachelor's degree in economics from Clark University, Massachusetts, USA.

Chris Mauss Managing Director Client Solutions EMEA

Chris Mauss

Managing Director

Chris Mauss is a Managing Director and is part of the Private Equity business department, based in Paris. He worked on Partners Group investment in Cerba Healthcare in France and serves on the Board of Directors of Laboratoires Serb. Chris has 18 years of industry experience. Prior to joining Partners Group, he was a Managing Director at Dubai International Capital, where he was responsible for some of the firms' European private equity investments. Chris spent 10 years with DIC and was actively involved in the turnaround and recovery of DIC's portfolio. He holds a master's degree from ESCP Europe in Paris, France.

Irene Mavroyannis Managing Director Client Solutions Americas

Irene Mavroyannis

Managing Director

Irene Mavroyannis is a Managing Director and the Global Co-Head of Business Development and Asset Class Experts for the Infrastructure business unit, based in New York. She has been with Partners Group since April 2023 and has 31+ years of experience in the financial services industry. Prior to joining Partners Group, she was the Global Head of the Infrastructure Private Capital Advisory business for Sera Global, Brookfield’s real assets advisory platform. Irene’s previous roles include Managing Director in the Investor Solutions Group at Macquarie Infrastructure and Real Assets (MIRA), Head of North America and Business Development at Hastings Funds Management and Global Product Specialist for Infrastructure & Energy at KKR. Irene also previously worked in investment banking at both Morgan Stanley and Citigroup in NY. She holds a Bachelor of Social Sciences (Econ/Math) from the University of Ottawa. She also received a Master of Laws from the University of Chicago Law School and a JD from the Faculty of Law, University of Ottawa. She sits on the University of Chicago Alumni Board, the Board of the Philharmonia Foundation and is a non-executive director at Verdigris Inc.

Stephen McCall Managing Director Real Estate EMEA

Stephen McCall

Managing Director

Stephen McCall is Global Head of Platforms and Operating Companies within the Private Real Estate business unit, based in London. He has over 25 years of industry experience across operations and finance and before joining Partners Group was most recently CEO of edyn Group – the international lifestyle hospitality platform. Prior to edyn, Stephen spent 17 years with IHG plc where he held a number of senior leadership roles including Group Head of Global Internal Audit, Chief Financial Officer for the MEA region, and Chief Operating Officer for Europe. He is a Chartered Management Accountant and holds a bachelor’s degree in Accountancy and Business from the University of Dundee, Scotland.

Marc Meier Managing Director Infrastructure EMEA

Marc Meier

Managing Director

Marc Meier is Co-Head of the Infrastructure Partnership Investments business unit, based in Zug. He is a member of the Infrastructure Investment Committee. He has been with Partners Group since 2008 and has 18 years of industry experience. Prior to joining Partners Group, he worked at Sal. Oppenheim Jr. & Cie. Corporate Finance (Switzerland) Ltd. He holds a master's degree in banking and finance from the University of St. Gallen (HSG), Switzerland.

Raphael Meier Managing Director Project Management Office EMEA

Raphael Meier

Managing Director

Raphael Meier is Head of the Project Management Office, based in Zug. He has been with Partners Group since 2002 and has 28 years of industry experience. Prior to joining Partners Group, he worked at the Swiss Bank Corporation, SBC Warburg Dillon Read and IFZ Institute for Financial Services. He holds a bachelor's degree in economics and business administration from the Lucerne University of Applied Sciences and Arts, Switzerland.

Steffen Meister Partner Board of Directors EMEA

Steffen Meister

Partner

Steffen Meister is a Partner of the firm and Executive Chairman of the Board of Directors of Partners Group Holding AG, based in Zug. He is also Chairman of the Corporate Development Committee, Chairman of the Investment Oversight Committee, and a member of its Client Oversight Committee and Operations Oversight Committee. Steffen Meister has been with Partners Group since 2000 and served as Delegate of the Board from 2013 to 2018 and as Chief Executive Officer from 2005 to 2013. He is a member of the Board of Directors of the firm’s portfolio company* Hearthside Food Solutions. Steffen Meister is furthermore the Co-Founder and Chairman of the Board of Directors of Crossiety AG, a social media platform for local communities in Switzerland, and a member of the Board of Directors of FAIRTIQ AG, a company providing advanced travel payment solutions for the public transport sector. Prior to joining Partners Group, he worked at Credit Suisse Financial Products and had assignments at Swiss Reinsurance Co. and the Department of Mathematics of the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology (ETH) in Zurich. Mr. Meister holds a Master's degree in Mathematics from the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology (ETH), Switzerland. *Partners Group representatives are members of the board of a portfolio company or a special purpose vehicle (SPV) established in connection with the respective investment.

Todd J. Miller Partner Private Equity Americas

Todd J. Miller

Partner

Todd J. Miller is Global Head of the Private Equity Health & Life business unit as well as Global Head of Growth Equity, based in Denver, and is a member of the Global Investment Committee, Private Equity Direct Lead and the Private Equity Direct Co-Investments, extension secondaries and direct lead growth investments in Health and Life Investment Committee. He serves as a member of the Board of Directors of portfolio companies EyeCare Partners and Confluent. He has 24 years of experience in the investment community and was previously a senior member of Chicago-based Sterling Partners, where he led many of the firm's investments in the healthcare and tech-enabled business services sector. Other former roles include Managing Director at Tri-Artisan Capital following High Yield and Leveraged Loan Capital Markets roles at Merrill Lynch. Todd holds a bachelor's degree in economics from the University of Michigan, USA.

Charles Miller-Jones Managing Director Private Equity EMEA

Charles Miller-Jones

Managing Director

Charles Miller-Jones is part of the Private Equity Services business unit, based in London. He is also a member of the Private Equity Direct Co-Investments, extension secondaries and direct lead growth investments in Services Investment Committee. He has 21 years of industry experience. Prior to joining Partners Group, he worked at OMERS Private Equity, Cinven and Lazard. He holds a master's degree from Cambridge University, UK.

Marlis Morin Partner Operations Asia-Pacific

Marlis Morin

Partner

Marlis Morin is a Partner at Partners Group, based in Singapore. She has been with Partners Group since 2003 and has 29 years of industry experience. Previously, Marlis was Head of the Client Services business department, and a member of the Executive Team and the Global Executive Board. She also built and headed the firm's Group Internal Audit function, and opened Partners Group's services and operations hub in Manila. Prior to joining Partners Group, Marlis worked at Credit Suisse Asset Management Funds as Head of Marketing Services for the European Retail Marketing, at Raiffeisen Landesbank Suedtirol and at Raiffeisenkasse Eisacktal. She holds a master's degree in international economics and business studies from the University of Innsbruck, Austria and Marquette University in Wisconsin, USA.

Reto Munz Managing Director Private Credit EMEA

Reto Munz

Managing Director

Reto Munz is the Co-Head Private Credit Portfolio Management and Restructuring business unit, based in Zug. He is a member of the Global Direct Credit Investment Committee and Direct Credit Europe Investment Committee. Previously, he was Head of the Liquid Private Markets business unit until 2019. He has been with Partners Group since 2005 and has 24 years of industry experience. Prior to joining Partners Group, he worked at Credit Suisse Asset Management. He holds a master’s degree in finance and investment from the University of Exeter, UK. He is also a CFA charterholder.

Stefan Näf Partner Client Solutions EMEA

Stefan Näf

Partner

Stefan Näf is Partners Group's Chairman of Clients and Co-Head Client Solutions Americas business unit, based in Zug. He is a member of the Global Executive Board. He has been with Partners Group since 2000 and has 28 years of industry experience. Previously he was part of the Private Equity Directs and Primaries business unit and subsequently founded the firm's London office. He was also formerly Head of the Client Solutions business department. Prior to joining Partners Group, he worked at the European Institute for Risk Management (EIRM). He holds a master’s degree in banking and finance from the University of St. Gallen (HSG), Switzerland.

Kim Nguyen Partner Private Equity EMEA

Kim Nguyen

Partner

Kim Nguyen is Head of the Private Equity Services business unit, based in Zug. He is a member of the Global Investment Committee, the Private Equity Direct Leads Investment Committee and Private Equity Direct Co-Investments, extension secondaries and direct lead growth investments in Services Investment Committee. He has 21 years of industry experience. He is a member of the Board of Directors of the firm's portfolio companies Version 1, Techem, Cerba, Emeria and Schleich. Prior to joining Partners Group, he worked at Bridgepoint, Nestlé and Bain & Company. He holds an MBA from the IMD Business School in Lausanne, Switzerland and a master’s degree in industrial engineering from the Swiss Federal institute of Technology (ETH) in Zurich, Switzerland.

Pascal Noth Managing Director Private Equity EMEA

Pascal Noth

Managing Director

Pascal Noth is part of the Private Equity Health and Life business unit, based in Zug. He is a member of the Private Equity Direct Leads Investment Committee, the Private Equity Direct Co-Investments, extension secondaries and direct lead growth investments in Health and Life Investment Committee and led the firm's investments into AMMEGA, Pharmathen, Sterling Pharma, Zabka, HTL and Laboratoires Serb. He has 23 years of industry experience and, prior to joining Partners Group, he was a Partner at Palamon Capital and worked at Goldman Sachs and Monitor Group. Pascal received the EY Entrepreneur of the Year in 2002 and holds an MBA with distinction from INSEAD, France where he received the Roche Fellowship of the Year. He also holds a master’s degree in Medical Neuroscience and Neural Computation from the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology (ETH) in Zurich, Switzerland.

Sara Odebunmi Managing Director Business Services Asia-Pacific

Sara Odebunmi

Managing Director

Sara Odebunmi is Global Head of the Platform Services business unit, based in Singapore. She has been with Partners Group since 2001 and has 23 years of industry experience. Previously she served as the Head of the Product Management business unit. Prior to joining Partners Group, she worked at C-Matrix Communications, one of the leading PR, communications and marketing consultancies in Switzerland, where she was responsible for healthcare and telecommunications mandates. She holds a bachelor's degree in business administration from the Zurich University of Applied Sciences and Arts, Switzerland.

Bilge Ogut Partner Private Equity EMEA

Bilge Ogut

Partner

Bilge Ogut is Head of the Private Equity Technology business unit, based in Zug. She is a member of the Board of Directors of the firm's portfolio companies Civica Idera and Unit 4. She has been with Partners Group since 2013 and has 30 years of industry experience. Prior to joining Partners Group, she worked at Standard Bank, Warburg Pincus and Goldman Sachs. She holds an MBA from Harvard Business School, Massachusetts, USA and a bachelor’s degree from the Wharton School at the University of Pennsylvania, USA.

Henrik Orrbeck Managing Director Real Estate EMEA

Henrik Orrbeck

Managing Director

Stephen Otter Managing Director Investments EMEA

Stephen Otter

Managing Director

Stephen Otter joined Partners Group as Head of Private Markets Royalties in 2024. Prior to that Stephen built and ran the royalty strategy of PG3 AG (which is the family office of the Partners Group co-founders) since July 2021. Previously and from January 2014, Stephen worked at FlowStream Commodities, a KKR backed energy royalty & streaming company, where as Head of Business Development, he was responsible for originating and executing royalty & streaming transactions globally. Prior to his role at FlowStream, Stephen spent close to a decade in Investment Banking in London where he was focused on M&A and capital raising. Stephen graduated with first class honours in Economics from the London School of Economics.

Gaëlle Olivier Member of the Board of Directors Board of Directors EMEA

Gaëlle Olivier

Member of the Board of Directors

Gaëlle Olivier has 30 years of experience in financial services. She is the Chairwoman of the Operations Oversight Committee and the Chairwoman of the Risk & Audit Committee. After a first career in the financial derivatives industry, Gaëlle joined AXA Group in 1998, where she held several senior executive roles over the next 21 years, ten of which were spent in Asia. In 2016, she was appointed CEO of AXA Group's Property & Casualty business, and a member of the AXA Group Management Committee. Most recently, she joined Société Generale in 2020 as Chief Executive Officer of Asia Pacific activities and then held the role of Group Deputy General Manager and Chief Operating Officer until the end of 2022.

Manuel Ottinger Managing Director Finance EMEA

Manuel Ottinger

Managing Director

Manuel Ottinger is Head of Group Finance business unit, based in Zug. He has been with Partners Group since 2008 and has 19 years of industry experience. Prior to joining Partners Group, he worked at Citigroup and Deutsche Bank. He holds a master’s degree in strategic management from HEC Paris, France and a master’s degree in banking & finance from the University of St. Gallen (HSG), Switzerland.

Luv Parikh Managing Director Infrastructure Asia-Pacific

Luv Parikh

Managing Director

Luv Parikh is the Co-Head of Infrastructure Asia business unit, based in Singapore. He has 23 years of industry experience. Prior to Blackstone, he was at Lehman Brothers and Prudential Securities in New York, and ran an automobile distributorship in India. Luv holds an MBA from Columbia Business School, New York, USA, where he graduated as a member of the Beta Gamma Sigma Honors Society and was a recipient of the Board of Overseers Fellowship. He holds a bachelor's degree from the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania, USA.
